label: Ready for initial review
description: Article is associated with a summary topic, typically by a new import or an attempted import of a duplicate.  It is now ready for initial review

label: Rejected by NOT list
description: Article appeared in a "NOT listed" journal, rejected without review

label: Rejected in initial review
description: Rejected in initial review, before publication to board managers

label: Passed initial review
description: Article ready for "publishing" for board manager review

label: Published
description: Article "published" for board manager review

label: Rejected by Board Manager
description: Board manager rejected article

label: Passed Board Manager
description: Board manager accepted article for further review

label: Rejected after full text review
description: Full text examined at OCE, article rejected

label: Passed full text review
description: Full text examined at OCE, article approved for board member review

label: Flagged as FYI
description: Article is being sent out without being linked to a specific topic

label: No further action
description: Decision after board member review is do not discuss.  Do not put on agenda.

label: Minor changes not for Board review
description: Changes may be made to summary but no board meeting required.  Do not put on agenda.

label: Summary changes for Board review (no paper for discussion)
description: Show this on the picklist of articles that can be added to agenda.  Summary changes have been proposed, but no paper exists.

label: Paper and summary changes for discussion
description: Show this on the picklist of articles that can be added to agenda.  Summary changes have been proposed.

label: Paper for Board discussion
description: Show this on the picklist of articles that can be added to agenda.  No changes proposed, discuss with Board.

label: Paper for Working Group discussion
description: Show this on the picklist of articles that can be added to agenda.  No changes proposed, discuss with Working Group.

label: On agenda
description: Article is on the agenda for an upcoming meeting.

label: Final board decision
description: Article was discussed at a board meeting and a decision was reached

label: On Hold
description: Article has been reviewed but should not yet be eligible for inclusion on meeting agendas.

label: Held After Full Text Review
description: Article should not yet be eligible for inclusion in review packets.
